attributes.action: Scrap repayment of student loans for miss-sold degrees that lead to no jobs
attributes.background:
What I believe that government should do
- fund further studying To enable students to specialise further.
- offer a year mandatory of paid work placement to all degrees.
-Review all degrees and look at employment rate and scrap any loans for students that have been Mis sold a possible career

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you feel you have been miss-sold a degree, you may wish to complain to the university you attended. This article sets out the rights students have as consumers:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/higher-education-a-short-guide-to-consumer-rights-for-students

The Office of the Independent Adjudicator can also consider complaints about universities in some circumstances:

https://www.oiahe.org.uk/

You could start a new petition calling for the student loans of people who do not find a job within a set period of time to be cancelled if that is something you would like to see happen.
